p: Sixth, the high AUCs obtained in our study may be due to the background points extracted from areas geographically and ecologically larger than the range of any given species ( Acevedo et al., 2012). Here, we used the omission rates to assess the Maxent modelling performance. Future studies could determine the background points of IPS based on the ecoregional ranges due to the similarities across complex multivariate environmental factors by grouping areas into similar categories.
